headline: 4 Discount Retail Stocks to Watch in 2026 as Shoppers Seek Bargains
summary: As consumers trade down, COST, ROST, DG and BURL stand to gain from value-driven spending and retail efficiency in 2026.

headline: Wall Street Sees a 21% Upside to Dollar General (DG)
summary: Dollar General Corporation (NYSE:DG) is one of the best stocks to buy according to Seth Klarman. As of December 12, the average price target for DG suggests a downside of a meager 0.11%; however, the Street high indicates an upside of 21%. As of the third quarter of 2025, Klarman owns 2.6 million shares of […]
